billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Relates to candy and other food products packaged as tobacco products or drug paraphernalia
summary: Prohibits the the sale, offering for sale and distribution of candy or other food products packaged, shaped or manufactured in the shape of tobacco products or drug paraphernalia; violations of such provisions shall constitute a violation as defined in the penal law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to candy and food products packaged as tobacco products or drug paraphernalia
